attributes.action: Allow hopsitals equiptment, new facilities, free of charge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If hospitals did not have to pay to improve their facilities e.g. build a new ward or buy new equiptment, then they could allocate this money to more staff, pay nurses better wages and increase research

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
